DOC.detailed_description: This 21-week multicenter , double-blind , parallel-group , randomize control trial compare efficacy tolerability add-on treatment 200mg topiramate versus placebo obese patient BED receive group CBT . The aim trial investigate efficacy tolerability adjunctive topiramate CBT obese patient BED improvement binge eating , related psychopathology , weight loss . The study hypothesis patient use topiramate + CBT loose weight patient use placebo + CBT.Tolerability investigate report adverse event dropout , reason leave study analyze .
